casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Vernon GOLDER 79PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2019 Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Golder, Kenneth Vernon.

Michael T. Henry, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. John F. Carella, Staff Attorney, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Ivy Johnson, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of July 2019 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of July 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
